name: Chongyun
description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

skillTalents.name: Demonbane
skillTalents.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous swirling attacks against all nearby enemies.

At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skillTalents.name: Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost
skillTalents.description:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.

After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all DMG done through Normal and Charged Attacks by Sword, Greatsword and Polearm-wielding characters will be converted to Cryo DMG.

skillTalents.name: Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star
skillTalents.description:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.

When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch enemies.

passiveTalents.name: Steady Breathing
passiveTalents.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal Attack SPD increased by 8%.

passiveTalents.name: Rimechaser Blade
passiveTalents.description: When the field created by Spirit Blade - Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit will be summoned to strike nearby enemies, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Enemies hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

passiveTalents.name: Gallant Journey
passiveTalents.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all enemies in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.description:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an enemy affected by Cold or Frozen status effects.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.description:
Increases the level of Spirit Blade - Chongyun's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description:
Spirit Blade - Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to enemies with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirt blade.
